==Background==
The local flower and herb shop, run by Cuitztli, an immigrant orlan.

==Points of interest==
* Three rooms, the bedroom has a chest that contains some minor loot.

==Characters==
* [[Cuitztli]], sells a large variety of ingredients.

==Loot==
* [[Apothecary's Gloves]]: Sold by Cuitztli.
